post.title: extender lenses=????
post.content: what is the purpose of them? is this one here--- canon u.s.a. : supplies accessories : extender ef 2x ii compatible with these lenses-- canon u.s.a. : consumer home office : ef 28-135mm f/3.5-5.6 is usm and this lense--- canon u.s.a. : consumer home office : ef 70-300mm f/4-5.6 is usm will the auto focus feature work?????
